tool_description: Suggests vocabulary improvements including word choice alternatives, elimination of redundancy, and enhancement of precision and variety in word usage.

text.description: Text to enhance with improved vocabulary

vocabulary_level.description: Target vocabulary complexity: basic, intermediate, or advanced

preserve_tone.description: Whether to maintain original tone while enhancing

error_messages: Invalid vocabulary level: Use one of [basic, intermediate, advanced].
Text too short: Provide at least 20 words for vocabulary enhancement.
Text too long: Maximum 15,000 characters for vocabulary analysis.
usage: Provide text with optional vocabulary level and tone preservation settings. Returns vocabulary improvement suggestions.

redundancy_flags.description: Words or phrases flagged as redundant
